CustomField.description: SFDC test of Multi-field field update with icons and page breaks
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HT__c ))," HT " & " " & HT__c &",", NULL) & BR() & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(CA__c )),IMAGE("https://c.na24.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0151a000000tHd0&oid=00D1a000000IiC1&lastMod=1458840542000", "phone icon", 30, 30) & " " & CA__c &",", NULL) & BR() & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Time_Frame__c)), IMAGE("https://c.na24.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0151a000000tHcv&oid=00D1a000000IiC1&lastMod=1458840400000", "clock icon", 30, 30) & " " & Time_Frame__c&"," , NULL) & BR() & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Name))," Inv. # " & " " & Name &"," , NULL) & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Man_Hrs__c))," Est. Hrs" & " "& Man_Hrs__c &",", NULL) & BR() & IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Unit_Number__c )), IMAGE("https://c.na24.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0151a000000tHcl&oid=00D1a000000IiC1&lastMod=1458840139000", "home icon", 30, 30) & " Unit " & Unit_Number__c & ",", NULL) & BR() & IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Property_Address__c)),"" & " " & Property_Address__c &",", NULL) & BR() & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Property_City__c)),"" & " " & Property_City__c , NULL)
CustomField.label: SFDC Test CA-Multi-Field Update
